config.question: What is the most likely drawback of a federal union of states as seen in the United States?

answer_3.response: Consider This: Jefferson described the controversy as “a fire bell in the night,” threatening the Union. In 1821, he wrote prophetically: “All, I fear, do not see the speck on our horizon which is to burst on us as a tornado, sooner or later.” See L.O. 9.3 What decisions did the federal government face as the country expanded?
